title: Drawing, "Landscape sketches from the Valais, Switzerland", August 24, 1868
inscribed:
reverse: inscriptions "sp...(?)/green/scattered/trees/trees"; "bare slate color of paper/trees/yellowish scattered trees/grey'; top,right, vertically: "rock cropping out/ of slate/ perpendicular".  Bottom right: "near Sion" / the date.
Reverse: top left: 'Martigay"/the date.  Beneath a line, center: a mountain house; caption: "House/built into/rock, walls/& vines'.  Beneath a line, bottom, in ipposite direction:  rough sketch of a cascade; inscribed: 'moss"; "fall moss". Top right: "Lovely cascade/Rich green and / sienna moss/ raining with water"/ a cross.
description: Verso: Mountain Peak from the Valais, Apennine Alps with various notes inscribed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Landscape sketches from the Valais, Switzerland", August 24, 1868.
August 24, 1868. Graphite, paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-1182.
